rules_text:
Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent’s turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Murktide Lurker, then each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Murktide Lurker.
notes:
